shined. Means: He, the Raghu having gotten the kingdom by guru, shined excessively like(/ than) Agni, bestowed glare by the Sun at dusk. ( It is believed that the Sun bestows his glare with Agni as he descends at dusk)

uprose. Means:: After Dilip,having heard the Ragu's eastablishing(as king) in the already smoke spread hearts of the other kings, fire started uprising. A stick smokes before it burns. Similarly in the hearts of other kings which were already, in Dilip's time, smoking , fire started uprising on hearing his(the Raghu's) establishing(as King) out of fear about his valiance .

she was Means:: The Rajya Lakshmi, though was enjoyed(wedded in literary sense) by many respected Kings starting from Manu, even then she was in him, the Raghu, like as earlier unowned, i.e. the vasundhara behaved as if Raghu was her prathama bhartha and rendered great benifits in his rule.
attracted/gained. Means:: Like the South wind(that pleases) without high cold and heat, he, the Raghu, by suitably(neither severe nor soft) punishing(ruling) gained the favour of all the public.
